Sentence.value: Below are questions you may want to ask your health care provider to help you use your oxygen.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Below are questions you may want to ask your [[health care provider|C0018724]] to help you use your [[oxygen|C0030054]].

Sentence.value: Is it safe to use petroleum jelly (Vaseline)?
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Is it safe to use [[petroleum jelly|C0031262]] ([[Vaseline|C0728774]])?
